metadataAttributes.Title: AI Product Management Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Manage the Design & Development of ML Products. Understand how machine learning works and when and how it can be applied to solve problems.  Learn to apply the data science process and best practices to lead machine learning projects,  and how to develop human-centered AI products which ensure privacy and ethical standards.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Predictive Analytics, Modeling, Artificial Neural Network, Project Management, Privacy, Design Thinking, Ethics,
